channel.title: 508 PVP Server Help!
channel.description: Okey i have a 508 Pvp Server, And i need help with the ::lvl 0 14000000, Ppl are glitching like this, ::lvl 0 14000000, And then they do, ::lvl 0 -14000000, And after that they get about 197/99 in attack. Anyone know how to fix that glitch so ppl can't do it anymore.

item.description:

Delete the ::lvl command? Idk cuz I dont do much with 508
